scripts.start: concurrently " npm run watch:scss " " npm run dev "
scripts.usemin: usemin index.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/index.html && usemin index.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/index.html && usemin contacto.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/contacto.html && usemin hotel_last.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/hotel_last.html && usemin hotel_most.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/hotel_most.html && usemin hotel.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/hotel.html && usemin payment.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/payment.html && usemin reserva.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/reserva.html
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run scss && npm run imagemin && npm run usemin
